name: Shizuku: Japanese myth
storyline: A drop of divine pattern that drips only once a year. The balance of the world was maintained by it, but one day it was cursed by someone. In order to restore peace to the world, a fox girl named "Rin" stood up.
summary: "Shizuku : Japanese myth" is a 2D action game set in Japan. The fox girl can transform into various forms, and can take over not only the form of the target but also its abilities. There is no single answer, and the game can be played according to your style of play.
